subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The U.S. men's national soccer team continued its World Cup warm-up tour with a 2-0 victory over Venezuela as Manager Bruce Arena trotted out his "B" squad, thus presenting a youthful side.
snippet: The U.S. men's national soccer team continued its World Cup warm-up tour with a 2-0 victory over Venezuela as Manager Bruce Arena trotted out his "B" squad, thus presenting a youthful side.
